snippet: The board of Hewlett-Packard, under criticism for overseeing a disastrous acquisition, is being shaken up. | Jon S. Corzine is avoiding, for now, a lawsuit from an MF Global bankruptcy trustee. | Jeffrey K. Skilling, the former chief of Enron, may...
abstract: The board of Hewlett-Packard, under criticism for overseeing a disastrous acquisition, is being shaken up. | Jon S. Corzine is avoiding, for now, a lawsuit from an MF Global bankruptcy trustee. | Jeffrey K. Skilling, the former chief of Enron, may leave prison early under a possible agreement with the government. | British and American authorities don’t see eye to eye in the search for a replacement for Libor.
